channel.title: Services on AS Consulting
channel.description: Recent content in Services on AS Consulting

item.title: Application Pentesting
item.description: End-to-End penetration testing on top of your mobile, web, IoT applications following OWASP standards.

item.title: Penetration Testing
item.description: Security exercise where we attempt to find, exploit vulnerabilities in your company simulating real life hackers.

item.title: Vulnerability Analysis
item.description: Identifying security weaknesses through in-house automated tools and scripts in your IT environment.

item.title: Cloud Security Audit
item.description: Complete security audit of AWS, GCP, Azure instances with accordance to CIS standards.

item.title: Network Audit
item.description: Network audits, focusing on both internal and external focusing on infrastructure level vulnerabilities.

item.title: Source Code Audit
item.description: Audit of your application source code to find issues in third-party dependencies, business logic.
